Room.Name: Avatar Ruins Central Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the main path running through the mysterious Avatar Ruins.
Room.LongDescription: The land looks like it's been turned upside down many times until just rocks and dirt are left. The strange place seems to lack just about any sort of natural beauty, as if the gods just turned their back on the area. Oddly enough, no magic works in this area as well.
